title: Triangle
description: TRIANGLETHE DIAMOND-STUDDED HELL OF SHOW BUSINESS TITANS AND TALENT MOGULS--SUPERSTARS AND SUPERSTUDSChuck Gordon--The man on top of the golden heap. The superagent, a secret homosexual who likes his sex mean, and his power ABSOLUTE...Brace Fontaine--An up-and-coming rat with more chutzpah than decency, a sexual politician who'll do anything to get what he wants--Chuck Gordon's help and Chuck Gordon's bed...Nina--A nice girl in a very unnice game, trapped by her husband Brace and his lover Chuck in a tightening vise of greed, perversion, and violence--TRIANGLE!
author: Arlene DeMarco
